sub_title: Head of Experience and Communication Strategy at Le Pub
summary:
.14+ years working in advertising, content and marketing, where the first 4 were focused on social media and digital strategy, but for the past 10 years I’ve been building integrated strategies for various global brands.

.After switching careers, where my original degree was in psychology, my passion for advertising started when I landed my first job working with social media and content creation, and even though I then migrated to broader strategic roles, digital strategy and storytelling have always been at the centre of everything I do.

.My fields of expertise are the financial, technology, spirit and Fashion industries, but I have also worked
with several other categories, from FMCG to Telecom. In my last agency role, before moving to the
Netherlands, I helped to shape the communication of Latin America’s largest bank, at DPZ&T - Publicis
Groupe, where I also double hatted as the Head of Content, with the task to give a spin on the way we
created stories, by going beyond social channels to give a more editorial point of view to the brands.

.At Converse, after joining the company as the Brand Communications Director, I was appointed to lead the Integrated Digital Marketing function, a hyper-localised data driven initiative responsible to boost their digital business, putting their e-commerce at the centre of everything we did.

.I also have a master degree in digital communication, was part of the staff at Miami Ad School, teaching
digital strategy, and I was rewarded with 5 EFFIE awards, 4 years in a row.

school.name: ESPM Escola Superior de Propaganda e Marketing

awards.description: Awarded silver prize at promotional campaign category with the case "McBot" for McDonalds, that use a Facebook bot to engage consumer with the tray's papers.

awards.title: Effie Awards / product launch category - Silver prize
awards.description: For the campaign "the incredible happen for those who share" for the smartphone Motorola Moto E

profile_positions.title: Head of Experience and Communication Strategy at Le Pub

profile_positions.description:
Driving communications leadership for 72andSunnys' clients including Under Armour, Zurich, Finance and Coca Cola. 

Working close with a wide international team of creative, social and innovation specialists to develop 360 solutions that drive brand-led business growth.

Skills: Comms planning · Brand Strategy · Creative Strategy · Creative Campaign Development
profile_positions.title: Communication Strategy Director

profile_positions.description:
In 2020, due to Covid-19, the company decided to shift its priorities to boost our digital business. And I was appointed to lead the Integrated Digital Marketing Offense. A hyper-localized initiative responsible for carrying our brand purpose throughout our digital efforts.

- Responsible for leading Converse's digital marketing and media efforts, across paid social media, CRM, programmatic advertising, affiliate marketing and search engine advertising. 

- Tasked to create, maintain and protect an elevated digital expression of the brand in Europe, working closely with our creative team, product planners, internal merchant and site experience team, media agencies and our U.S. partners / global team to create and calendarize campaign strategies to achieve sales objectives.

- Develop and implement overall Integrated Marketing strategy.

- Collaborate with local Business team to drive best in class digital marketing initiatives for multiple countries, including paid social, search marketing, email marketing, display advertising and affiliate marketing.

- Partnering with agencies and media platforms to create and optimize our paid media programs.

- Establish effective benchmarks for measurement of digital marketing efforts, as well as paid cross-channel activities, in order to define best practices for analytics and ensure consistent of analysis and data-driven recommendations to improve future success.

- Managing multiple budgets and supervise digital media integration into broader brand traffic/sales initiatives (Full funnel).

- Scouting and recommending emerging platforms, features, Beta opportunities, etc, and maintain a thorough understanding of current and emerging trends in digital marketing, paid social media, technology, culture, fashion and eCommerce.

- Uncover hyper local online and offline consumer insights that fuel digital operations
profile_positions.title: Integrated Digital Marketing Director

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for leading Digital Marketing, Integrated Media & Brand Communications ensuring the brand delivers a distinct brand voice and elevated brand content across Converse.com, and paid media.

- In my first year in Converse, I was able to deliver one Global and regional journey across two chapters: Converse Renew and Converse Twisted, to Continue the development of “Spark Progress” as our brand voice for our GenZ audience. 

- Lead 2x fully integrated communication strategy and plans for our main stories to guide all the functions and channels to build a relevant and engaging brand narrative.

- Supported the local European markets to build the brand’s narrative beyond paid media. 

- Launched and built an engaged digital community through our London IG handle

- Developed a content and growth strategy for @Converse_London

- Lead the .com full funnel integration to create synergy between Brand paid media and performance market in order to leverage the audiences, data and demand generated from our main brand efforts.  

- Drove and supported cross functional ways of working with Brand Marketing; Content creation, media planning, DTC experience and performance marketing. 

- Drove a mobile first mindset for consumer shopping experiences across our digital touch points.

- Utilize data & insights to create targeted and impactful consumer journeys
profile_positions.title: Brand Communication Director Western Europe

profile_positions.description:
Clients: Global Foods & Refreshments - Knorr, Hellmann’s, Magnum, Lipton, Wall's, Cornetto
Regional and Local - Home Care and Personal Care

Activities: Responsible for the management of U-Studio, Unilever's in-house agency, servicing Global Foods & Refreshments and Europe cross-category. 
I'm responsible for the business strategy, P&L, secure the creative quality of the communication, relationship building with brand teams, brand guardianship to secure that the agency follows the brand strategy and also delivery high quality digital assets quickly and and cost effectively, achieving satisfactory targets even in its set up year.
profile_positions.title: Global Senior Digital & Content Manager | U-Studios

profile_positions.description:
Client: Heineken

Activities: Worked on developing Heineken’s global strategy for 2018
profile_positions.title: Strategist Freelancer

profile_positions.description:
DPZ&T, Publicis Groupe - 5th biggest and one of the most renowned agency in Brazil. Agency of the year 2017.

Clients:Bank Itaú, Vivo Telefonica, Natura and McDonalds

Activities: As a head of content, my role was to develop our clients towards a more editorial content production mindset, in order to establish them as brand publishers, by producing content that went beyond their social media / digital presence. Also managed a team of 7 people, with different backgrounds that went from brand journalist to digital producers. 

Work worth mentioning: 
.Itaú - 60 minutes documentary about the importance to read to a child 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lR-q-bFNeYM

.Itaú - A TV show to teach millennials how to deal with their finances
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-2r2CQ3BrrA
profile_positions.title: Head of Content

profile_positions.description:
DPZ&T Publicis Groupe - 5th biggest and one of the most renowned agency in Brazil. Agency of the year 2017.

Clients: Bank Itaú - Private largest bank in LATAM, 1st most appreciated brand in the finance segment, €280 million in media budget per year.

Activities: Strategy team Leader for both digital and offline communication. Brand development + Brand repositioning. Responsible for the integration of all departments in order to delivery a full service communication to our clients. Consumer insights. Comms planning + Data strategy. Managed a team of 6 strategist. 

Work worth mentioning: 
.Itaú - Awarded two Effie Awards (2018), Financial segment and Branded Content, with the campaign “StarGirl”. It is a campaign that took purpose to action, by not only telling people the importance to read to a child, but also transforming their mobile devices into interactive books.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6m2NZkXqUHY
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mqWxPANEXyc

.McDonald’s - Awarded a Silver Effie (2017) with the campaign “Tray Quest”. Use of data + content + promotion to re-engage millennials with one of the most important media for McDonal’s, its trays. 
https://vimeo.com/217087569
	
.Itaucard - Awarded a Bronze Effie (2016) with the campaign “the digital world was never so Itaucard’. A data driven campaign that was created to drive downloads of the app, but ended up generating €10 million in revenue.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SdT5DvFDj3o
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIQ3aIxJlCY
profile_positions.title: Strategy Director

profile_positions.description:
F.biz WPP Group - Brazil’s biggest and most recognized digital agency. Part of Unilever’s global digital agency roster. For the past 7 years it has established itself as a full-service agency.

Clients: Motorola Mobility Latin America, 
              Pernod Ricard: Absolut, Chivas, Jameson and Orloff 		 
              PepsiCo: Toddynho, Lipton and Kero Coco 		  
              Unilever: Close-up, Lux, Rexona, Lifebuoy, Cif and Domestos (Global) 	
              HSBC 

Activities: Strategy team Leader for both digital and offline communication. Brand repositioning. Responsible for the integration of all departments in order to delivery a full service communication to our clients. Comms planning + Data strategy. Consumer insights. Managed a team of 7 strategist. Responsible for projects that went beyond communication, such as UX consultant projects and digital ecosystems creation.

Work worth mentioning: 
.Motorola - Awarded a Silver Effie (2015) with the campaign “The incredible only happens for those who share”. A product repositioning campaign that challenged the global view by adding a layer of consumer’s culture, making the sales increased in 511% compared to the previous generation. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U1SpqrPr8Jg

.Absolut Open Film Project - The first short film in Brazil created only using social networks.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k0oQxzKb6xQ
